name: Maneuver in Flight
description:
You try a difficult maneuver while flying. Attempt an Acrobatics 
check. The GM determines what maneuvers are possible, but 
they rarely allow you to move farther than your fly Speed.
 Success You succeed at the maneuver.

effects.failure:
Your maneuver fails. The GM chooses if you simply 
canâ€™t move or if some other detrimental effect happens. 
The outcome should be appropriate for the maneuver you 
attempted (for instance, being blown off course if you were 
trying to fly against a strong wind).
effects.criticalFailure: As failure, but the consequence is more dire.
